rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0001
rows.name:
A long, long time ago in
Gula, there was a city
called the White Chair.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It had the oldest history in Gula, and
was the cornerstone of the nation, a
capital with a strong fortress...

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But it was destroyed by the
Superbian Empire. Utterly
and completely destroyed.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Because of this incident,
Gula chose to become a
vassal state of Superbia...

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0005
rows.name:
But this is a story from my ancestors,
so it's not like I hold a grudge
against Superbia or anything.
